name: Military Shooting King
description:
Just touch and aim your target and shoot! That’s it!
Go for the headshot on those evil terrorists that pop up
in warehouse, harbor, factory, desert, and many other maps!

[Game Feature]
- One-touch Sniper FPS game is fun for everyone!
- Try to get higher score by taking wind into consideration when aiming!
- There are various items that can help improve your shooting skills!
- Game supports multi-player mode for real-time shootout against other players!
- Game supports off-line match to test your skills with your friend next to you!
- There are Stage Mode, Shootout Mode, Mini Game, and Timeless Mode!
- Game supports 16 languages, Achievements, and Leaderboard!
- Game is compatible with Tablet PC!
